description: A hwTwampTwoWayLossRatioExceed trap is sent when the two-way loss ratio of TWAMP
test instance exceeds the uppper threshold in 1-minute statistics period.
This object indicates the loss ratio value when the loss of the two-way ETH-LM is
higher/lower than the configured alarm threshold, and the value divided by 1000000 is the loss ratio(%).
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayLossRatio

description: This object indicates the upper limit of the two-way ETH-LM,
and the value divided by 1000000 is the loss ratio(%).
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayLossRatioUpperLimitThreshold

description: This object indicates the lower limit of the two-way ETH-LM,
and the value divided by 1000000 is the loss ratio(%).
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayLossRatioLowerLimitThreshold

description: A hwTwampTwoWayLossRatioRecovery trap is sent when the two-way loss ratio of TWAMP
test instance is lower than the lower threshold in 1-minute statistics period.
This object indicates the loss ratio value when the loss of the two-way ETH-LM is
higher/lower than the configured alarm threshold, and the value divided by 1000000 is the loss ratio(%).
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayLossRatio

description: This object indicates the upper limit of the two-way ETH-LM,
and the value divided by 1000000 is the loss ratio(%).
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayLossRatioUpperLimitThreshold

description: This object indicates the lower limit of the two-way ETH-LM,
and the value divided by 1000000 is the loss ratio(%).
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayLossRatioLowerLimitThreshold

description: A hwTwampTwoWayDelayExceed trap is sent when the two-way delay of TWAMP
test instance exceeds the uppper threshold in 3 consecutive test periods.
This object indicates the delay value(ms) when the delay of the two-way ETH-DM
is higher/lower than the configured alarm threshold.
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayDelayValue

description: This object indicates the upper limit(ms) of the two-way ETH-DM.
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayDelayValueUpperLimitThreshold

description: This object indicates the lower limit(ms) of the two-way ETH-DM.
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayDelayValueLowerLimitThreshold

description: A hwTwampTwoWayDelayRecovery trap is sent when the two-way delay of TWAMP
test instance is lower than the lower threshold in 3 consecutive test periods.
This object indicates the delay value(ms) when the delay of the two-way ETH-DM
is higher/lower than the configured alarm threshold.
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayDelayValue

description: This object indicates the upper limit(ms) of the two-way ETH-DM.
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayDelayValueUpperLimitThreshold

description: This object indicates the lower limit(ms) of the two-way ETH-DM.
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayDelayValueLowerLimitThreshold

description: A hwTwampTwoWayJitterExceed trap is sent when the two-way jitter of TWAMP
test instance exceeds the uppper threshold in 3 consecutive test periods.
This object indicates the jitter value(ms) when the jitter of the two-way ETH-DM
is higher/lower than the configured alarm threshold.
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayJitterValue

description: This object indicates the upper limit(ms) of the two-way ETH-DM.
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayJitterValueUpperLimitThreshold

description: This object indicates lower limit(ms) of the two-way ETH-DM.
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayJitterValueLowerLimitThreshold

description: A hwTwampTwoWayJitterRecovery trap is sent when the two-way jitter of TWAMP
test instance is lower than the lower threshold in 3 consecutive test periods.
This object indicates the jitter value(ms) when the jitter of the two-way ETH-DM
is higher/lower than the configured alarm threshold.
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayJitterValue

description: This object indicates the upper limit(ms) of the two-way ETH-DM.
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayJitterValueUpperLimitThreshold

description: This object indicates lower limit(ms) of the two-way ETH-DM.
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayJitterValueLowerLimitThreshold

description: A hwTwampTwoWayLocExceed trap is sent when the two-way loss ratio
of the detected network reaches the LOC threshold(100%) in 3 consecutive test periods.

event.Summary: TWAMP two-way loss ratio $v1 reached LOC threshold

description: This object indicates the loss ratio value when the loss of the two-way ETH-LM is
higher/lower than the configured alarm threshold, and the value divided by 1000000 is the loss ratio(%).
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayLossRatio

description: A hwTwampTwoWayLocRecovery trap is sent when the two-way loss ratio
is lower than the LOC threshold(100%) in 3 consecutive test periods.

event.Summary: TWAMP two-way loss recovered below LOC threshold

description: This object indicates the loss ratio value when the loss of the two-way ETH-LM is
higher/lower than the configured alarm threshold, and the value divided by 1000000 is the loss ratio(%).
variables.name: HUAWEI-TWAMP-MIB::hwTwampTwoWayLossRatio

description: A hwTwampSenderSessionNumExceed trap is sent when the number of TWAMP sender session is out of device capability.

event.Summary: TWAMP sender sessions exceed device limit

description: A hwTwampSenderSessionNumRecovery trap is sent when the number of TWAMP sender session is under device capability..

event.Summary: TWAMP sender sessions within device limit
